original_text:
The highest heavens belong to the Lord,
    but the earth he has given to mankind.
korean_text: 하늘은 여호와의 하늘이라도 땅은 사람에게 주셨도다

sentences.original_text: The highest heavens belong to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 가장 높은 하늘은 주님께 속해 있고

sentences.original_text: but the earth he has given to mankind
